name: respACT - austrian business council for sustainable development
headAddress: respACT - austrian business council for sustainable development
goal: respACT is the biggest business association for CSR and sustainable development in Austria. We support our member companies during the process of achieving social and ecological aims within their business activities. Furthermore, we are taking action in order to ensure that responsible companies are being heard by the public.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Youth
euInitiatives: We follow legislation on corporate sustainability, but we currently do not participate in the dialogue about legislation policies.
